description:
Hinata, Kokona and Aoi plan to watch the first sunrise from atop Mt. Tenranzan, but the plan may change on a dime when they get unexpected news!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Hatsuhi no De, Doko de Miru? / Classmate to Yamanobori!
Where to Watch the First Sunrise / Hiking with Classmates!
初日の出, どこで見る? / クラスメイトと山登り!
